label: Purpose Compatibility
definition: Status representing the compatibility of the new purpose with the principle of purpose limitation according to the GDPR

label: Purpose Compatibility Assessment
definition: An assessment for evaluating the compatibility of the new purpose with the principle of purpose limitation according to the GDPR

label: Purpose Compatible
definition: Status representing the new purpose is compatible with the principle of purpose limitation according to the GDPR
scopenote: A compatible purpose can allow for continued use of the same legal basis without any changes

label: Purpose Incompatible
definition: Status representing the new purpose is incompatible with the principle of purpose limitation according to the GDPR
scopenote: An incompatible purpose means the process cannot be continued without a new valid legal basis
